game.name: DCS: MiG-29A Fulcrum
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, LAN PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, LAN 협동, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 추적되는 컨트롤러 지원, 캡션 이용 가능, VR 지원, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 레벨 에디터 포함
game.shortDescription: The MiG-29A remains one of the most famous fighters in the world due to its outstanding performance characteristics, reliability, and simplicity of the weapons systems.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The MiG-29A remains one of the most famous fighters in the world due to its outstanding performance characteristics, reliability, and simplicity of the weapons systems.
